thread.title: Trump demands broad bill on guns in meeting

title: Trump demands broad bill on guns in meeting
text:
Trump demands broad bill on guns in meeting Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:51 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday urged a diverse group of lawmakers - some who want more gun restrictions, others averse to gun control - to come up with comprehensive legislation to prevent school shootings following the nation’s most recent massacre.   
U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday urged a diverse group of lawmakers - some who want more gun restrictions, others averse to gun control - to come up with comprehensive legislation to prevent school shootings following the nation’s most recent massacre.  //reut.rs/2GUH1AN
